extendedInfo.description: Set Locale   Set Locale and Language   As we know that some rom of Android have no full set of language,sometimes it is hard to set the language you want in your phone.Or if the custom locale function in menu don't support your language,you can try this app!   You can select more locales via this app.This app will tell you what language is supported in your cellphone, you can set this language by just one click!   If your locale doesn't appear, please use custom locale function in menu.   Save locale function is available.To search apps for this app, you may try with Key Words:   -Language   -set language   -more locale 2   -more locate   -xda   -locale set   -set locale   -more locale 2 pro If you have some advice , mail me.If you don't want this app, please don't download it, if you think this app is helpful ,please rating 5 stars and help us to click some ad to make us work better.Thank you.

reviews.comment: Doesnt change anything anymore,  keeps crashing. It used to be really good. :( pleasee fix i used to love this app so much: <
reviews.author: Chesca Brua

reviews.title: Looks Good but didn\'t work :-(
reviews.comment: It had a menu choice for \"Australia\" so no need for a custom setting however it dies when you try to use it on Android 4.2.1,, 4.2.2 and now 4.3 (author not fixing)  the \"MoreLocale 2\" app had no such issue.
reviews.author: Dennis Bareis

reviews.title: Galaxy S4 Crashed
reviews.comment: Not the Apps for Andriod 4.2.2. Have to delete the App. Switching back to iPhone 5 for language purpose!
reviews.author: Pianhui Wang

reviews.title: Changes language
reviews.comment: Does not change my locale at all. Still get \'unable to install app in your country\' message, when trying to install apps from locale I set my phone to.

reviews.title: S3 i9305 4.1.2
reviews.comment: My issue was to access Paypal mobile, if I had my locale to English UK (which is the default) I can\'t login. This app changed it to English Australia, and it does what I wanted it to do. Well done.
reviews.author: Darius Taslim

reviews.title: Not solving MY problem
reviews.comment: Can you please work out the filipino language because even i am a filipino i dont understand it.
reviews.author: Brent Valdez

reviews.title: Enabled Google Now Voice in Canada on Note 2
reviews.comment: This app allowed me to set my Telus Canada Galaxy Note 2 to US English and thereby enable voice responses from Google Now. Excellent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only wish the language would stay even after rebooting the phone. But nonetheless excellent app! Thanks so much!

reviews.comment: As simple picuters the arabic langauge is inside but whenbi installed its not:( hop add it soon Thanks
reviews.author: Dlshad Defy

reviews.title: Superb app
reviews.comment: Purchased a V1277 smartphone from China. Good droid phone but it only had English US in the language settings. That means apps like Amazon will always default to USA stores. Tried everything to find English UK including searching and posting on android forums without success. Discovered this app installed it and instantly changed the language to English (United Kingdom). It will even keep the setting following reboots. You may need to reinstall apps like Amazon to recognize the new settings but fantastic app and its free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not working on HTC ONE S after upgrading to 4.1.1
reviews.comment: It used to work fine. It held my customized locale after rebooting.  But after I upgrade my HTC ONE S to Android 4.1.1. It doesn\'t keep my customized locale after rebooting.  Maybe time for the developer to tweak for new Android version?
reviews.author: Henry Jin

reviews.title: Really works
reviews.comment: With this app I got Google Now Talkback to work, which is nog available in Dutch. Great!
reviews.author: Walter Huijten

reviews.title: Saved my life,
reviews.comment: Managed to sort out the language issue on HTC flyer from India, and set it as English UK, now I can fully use it with amazon apps etc, Wow this is magical, Thankyou so much, x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Google Now
reviews.comment: Had a problem with Google Now and I used this to change system language to \"Englis (us)\" and it fixed it!!! Thanks a lot guys!
